import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import { Header } from "../../common/Header"; import { Home } from "./Home"; import { Assets } from "./Assets"; import { Domain } from "./Domain"; import { Subdomains } from "./Subdomains"; import { Services } from "./Services"; import { Alerts } from "./Alerts"; import { MDBBtn, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardText, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBFormInline, MDBIcon, MDBInput, MDBRow, MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead, MDBLink } from "mdbreact"; import { useHistory } from "react-router"; import logo from '../../assets/images/logo-white-large.png'; import "./style.css" export const Dashboard = (props: any) => { const [view, setView] = useState('home'); const [account, setAccount] = useState('DEV'); const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); const SwitchView = (value: any) => { console.log(value) setView(value) } const Account = (e: any) => { console.log(e.target.value) setAccount(e.target.value) } console.log(props) const history = useHistory(); const Switch = (e: any) => { console.log(e) setView(e) } console.log(token) if (token === null || token === undefined || token === 'undefined' || token.length <0) { return } if (props.User !== undefined && props.User.is_onboarded === false) { return } return ( <>
